facts.name: task_type
allowed: give the antibiotic and the antimalarial
continue to give your child food and drink
how much water to mix with the ORS packet
how much ORS to give your child
for how many days to give the medicine

conditions: any_of:task_type eq "give the antibiotic and the antimalarial" && task_type eq "get to the health facility" && task_type eq "how much water to mix with the ORS packet" && task_type eq "continue to give your child food and drink" && task_type eq "bring your child back" && task_type eq "how much ORS to give your child" && task_type eq "keep the child warm" && task_type eq "for how many days to give the medicine"

actions.id: Do a rapid diagnostic test (RDT) for malaria

actions.id: If RDT is positive, give oral antimalarial AL

conditions: all_of:age_months ge 36 && age_months lt 48 && cough_present==true && fever_present==true && fever_duration_days eq 5

actions.id: Counsel caregiver on feeding or refer the child to a supplementary feeding programme, if available

actions.id: Counsel caregiver on feeding or refer the child to a supplementary feeding programme, if available

actions.id: Do a rapid diagnostic test (RDT) for malaria
If RDT is positive, give oral antimalarial AL
Counsel caregiver on feeding or refer the child to a supplementary feeding programme, if available
Advise caregiver to give more fluids and continue feeding
Advise caregiver on sleeping under a bednet (ITN)

Advise caregiver on sleeping under a bednet (ITN)
